Package de.gnwi.mfsim.model.graphics.shape

Class ShapeBox

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.mfsim.model.graphics.shape.ShapeBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
ShapeInterface
public class ShapeBox extends Object implements ShapeInterface
This class represents a 2D box. The box is defined by its side lengths x an y.
Author:
Achim Zielesny

  • Constructor Details

    • ShapeBox

      public ShapeBox(PointInPlane aPoint, double aXLength, double aYLength, BodyInterface aBody) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      aPoint - Center of box
      aXLength - x-length of box, not allowed to be less than 0
      aYLength - y-length of box, not allowed to be less than 0
      aBody - BodyInterface object from which the ShapeInterface object is derived
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if an argument is illegal

    • ShapeBox

      public ShapeBox(double aXCoordinate, double aYCoordinate, double aXLength, double aYLength, BodyInterface aBody) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      aXCoordinate - Coordinate of the center on the horizontal axis
      aYCoordinate - Coordinate of the center on the vertical axis
      aXLength - x-length of box, not allowed to be less than 0
      aYLength - y-length of box, not allowed to be less than 0
      aBody - BodyInterface object from which the ShapeInterface object is derived
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if an argument is illegal

    • isInShapeArea

      public boolean isInShapeArea(PointInPlane aPoint)
      Returns if a PointInPlane is within the area of the ShapeInterface object
      Specified by:
      isInShapeArea in interface ShapeInterface
      Parameters:
      aPoint - PointInPlane which has to be tested
      Returns:
      true if aPoint is within the area of the ShapeInterface object, false otherwise

    • setAttenuation

      public void setAttenuation(double aValue)
      Attenuation for box position. An invalid value is corrected to minimum (0.0) or maximum (1.0).
      Specified by:
      setAttenuation in interface ShapeInterface
      Parameters:
      aValue - Attenuation for box position (0.0: Minimum, 1.0: Maximum)
